short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sunset wallpaper turn new tab to HD Sunset background. Custom Sunset wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Sunset wallpapers with every new tab opening.
2. Customize your Sunset background, or set favorites in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel customization for swift website access.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Quick download option for wallpapers.
14. Quick access to game.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Sunset tab.
